verses.verse: וַ֭יַּעַן <WH6030> answered אֱלִיפַ֥ז <WH464> Then Eliphaz הַֽתֵּימָנִ֗י <WH8489> the Temanite וַיֹּאמַֽר׃ <WH559> and said

הֲנִסָּ֬ה <WH5254> [If] we assay דָבָ֣ר <WH1697> to commune אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> you תִּלְאֶ֑ה <WH3811> with thee wilt thou be grieved וַעְצֹ֥ר <WH6113> withhold בְּ֝מִלִּ֗ין <WH4405> answer מִ֣י <WH4310> any יוּכָֽל׃ <WH3201> ? but who can
הִ֭נֵּה <WH2009> Behold יִסַּ֣רְתָּ <WH3256> Behold thou hast instructed רַבִּ֑ים <WH7227> many וְיָדַ֖יִם <WH3027> hands רָפ֣וֹת <WH7504> the weak תְּחַזֵּֽק׃ <WH2388> and thou hast strengthened

כּ֭וֹשֵׁל <WH3782> him that was falling יְקִימ֣וּן <WH6965> have upholden מִלֶּ֑יךָ <WH4405> Thy words וּבִרְכַּ֖יִם <WH1290> knees כֹּרְע֣וֹת <WH3766> the feeble תְּאַמֵּֽץ׃ <WH553> and thou hast strengthened

כִּ֤י <WH3588> But עַתָּ֨ה ׀ <WH6258> now תָּב֣וֹא <WH935> But now it is come אֵלֶ֣יךָ <WH413> to you וַתֵּ֑לֶא <WH3811> upon thee and thou faintest תִּגַּ֥ע <WH5060> it toucheth עָ֝דֶ֗יךָ <WH5704> and you וַתִּבָּהֵֽל׃ <WH926> thee and thou art troubled
הֲלֹ֣א <WH3808> not יִ֭רְאָתְךָ <WH3373> afraid כִּסְלָתֶ֑ךָ <WH3690> thy confidence תִּ֝קְוָתְךָ֗ <WH8615> thy hope וְתֹ֣ם <WH8537> and the uprightness דְּרָכֶֽיךָ׃ <WH1870> of your ways

זְכָר־ <WH2142> Remember נָ֗א <WH4994> now מִ֤י <WH4310> who ה֣וּא <WH1931> he נָקִ֣י <WH5355> blameless אָבָ֑ד <WH6> I pray thee who [ever] perished וְ֝אֵיפֹ֗ה <WH375> what manner יְשָׁרִ֥ים <WH3477> were the righteous נִכְחָֽדוּ׃ <WH3582> cut off

כַּאֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> to what רָ֭אִיתִי <WH7200> Even as I have seen חֹ֣רְשֵׁי <WH2790> they that plow אָ֑וֶן <WH205> iniquity וְזֹרְעֵ֖י <WH2232> and sow עָמָ֣ל <WH5999> wickedness יִקְצְרֻֽהוּ׃ <WH7114> reap
מִנִּשְׁמַ֣ת <WH5397> By the blast אֱל֣וֹהַ <WH433> of God יֹאבֵ֑דוּ <WH6> they perish וּמֵר֖וּחַ <WH7307> and by the breath אַפּ֣וֹ <WH639> of his nostrils יִכְלֽוּ׃ <WH3615> are they consumed

שַׁאֲגַ֣ת <WH7581> The roaring אַ֭רְיֵה <WH738> of the lion וְק֣וֹל <WH6963> and the voice שָׁ֑חַל <WH7826> of the fierce lion וְשִׁנֵּ֖י <WH8127> and the teeth כְפִירִ֣ים <WH3715> of the young lions נִתָּֽעוּ׃ <WH5421> are broken

לַ֭יִשׁ <WH3918> The old lion אֹבֵ֣ד <WH6> perisheth מִבְּלִי־ <WH1097> for lack טָ֑רֶף <WH2964> of prey וּבְנֵ֥י <WH1121> whelps לָ֝בִ֗יא <WH3833> and the stout lion's יִתְפָּרָֽדוּ׃ <WH6504> are scattered abroad

וְ֭אֵלַי <WH413> about דָּבָ֣ר <WH1697> Now a thing יְגֻנָּ֑ב <WH1589> was secretly brought וַתִּקַּ֥ח <WH3947> received אָ֝זְנִ֗י <WH241> to me and mine ear שֵׁ֣מֶץ <WH8102> a little מֶֽנְהֽוּ׃ <WH4480> In

בִּ֭שְׂעִפִּים <WH5587> In thoughts מֵחֶזְיֹנ֣וֹת <WH2384> from the visions לָ֑יְלָה <WH3915> of the night בִּנְפֹ֥ל <WH5307> falleth תַּ֝רְדֵּמָ֗ה <WH8639> when deep sleep עַל־ <WH5921> on אֲנָשִֽׁים׃ <WH376> men
פַּ֣חַד <WH6343> Fear קְ֭רָאַנִי <WH7122> came וּרְעָדָ֑ה <WH7460> tremble וְרֹ֖ב <WH7230> which made all עַצְמוֹתַ֣י <WH6106> my bones הִפְחִֽיד׃ <WH6342> to shake
וְ֭רוּחַ <WH7307> Then a spirit עַל־ <WH5921> by פָּנַ֣י <WH6440> before my face יַחֲלֹ֑ף <WH2498> passed תְּ֝סַמֵּ֗ר <WH5568> stood up שַֽׂעֲרַ֥ת <WH8185> the hair בְּשָׂרִֽי׃ <WH1320> of my flesh

יַעֲמֹ֤ד ׀ <WH5975> It stood still וְֽלֹא־ <WH3808> not אַכִּ֬יר <WH5234> but I could not discern מַרְאֵ֗הוּ <WH4758> the form תְּ֭מוּנָה <WH8544> thereof an image לְנֶ֣גֶד <WH5048> before עֵינָ֑י <WH5869> [was] before mine eyes דְּמָמָ֖ה <WH1827> [there was] silence וָק֣וֹל <WH6963> a voice אֶשְׁמָֽע׃ <WH8085> and I heard
הַֽ֭אֱנוֹשׁ <WH376> he מֵאֱל֣וֹהַ <WH433> God יִצְדָּ֑ק <WH6663> be more just אִ֥ם <WH518> lo מֵ֝עֹשֵׂ֗הוּ <WH6213> than his maker יִטְהַר־ <WH2891> be more pure גָּֽבֶר׃ <WH1397> every one

הֵ֣ן <WH2005> even בַּ֭עֲבָדָיו <WH5650> in his servants לֹ֣א <WH3808> no יַאֲמִ֑ין <WH539> Behold he put no trust וּ֝בְמַלְאָכָ֗יו <WH4397> and his angels יָשִׂ֥ים <WH7760> he charged תָּהֳלָֽה׃ <WH8417> with folly

אַ֤ף ׀ <WH637> How much less שֹׁכְנֵ֬י <WH7931> [in] them that dwell בָֽתֵּי־ <WH1004> in houses חֹ֗מֶר <WH2563> of clay אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> Whose בֶּעָפָ֥ר <WH6083> [is] in the dust יְסוֹדָ֑ם <WH3247> whose foundation יְ֝דַכְּא֗וּם <WH1792> [which] are crushed לִפְנֵי־ <WH6440> before עָֽשׁ׃ <WH6211> the moth

מִבֹּ֣קֶר <WH1242> from morning לָעֶ֣רֶב <WH6153> to evening יֻכַּ֑תּוּ <WH3807> They are destroyed מִבְּלִ֥י <WH1097> corruption מֵ֝שִׂ֗ים <WH7760> without any regarding לָנֶ֥צַח <WH5331> for ever יֹאבֵֽדוּ׃ <WH6> they perish

הֲלֹא־ <WH3808> without נִסַּ֣ע <WH5265> [which is] in them go away יִתְרָ֣ם <WH3499> Doth not their excellency בָּ֑ם יָ֝מ֗וּתוּ <WH4191> ? they die וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> without בְחָכְמָֽה׃ <WH2451> even without wisdom
